pathAssistantSteps.info:
For C&M User:

1.Present the aggregated Quip document to Client Council and Capture the recommendations

2.Accept/Reject the New Client

3.Add recommendations in Linkreta

4.Check the assigned tasks

For C&M User:

Add Client Council deck (Quip):

1. Click on 'Documentation' tab

2. Click at drop down menu option on the right side of the section and select 'Open Template Library'

3. Access CNM Team folder

4. Select 'Client Council Review Quip' Template for the respective New Client record


Add Aggregated Client Council Deck:

1. Select 'Quip Index' Template for Aggregated Client Council Deck (Quip) & follow same steps as 1 to 3. Then use the "Quip Index" template and create the document

Add 'Debrief Template' by following steps:

1. Select 'Document' Tab

2. Click 'Open Template Library'

3. Select 'Lost Debrief' Template

4. Update the Document


Schedule follow-ups meeting with Client

Add 'Debrief Template' by following steps:

1. Select 'Document' Tab

2. Click 'Open Template Library'

3. Select 'Won Debrief' Template

4. Update the Document

Connect with Client by sending Meeting invitation by completing the following tasks:

1. Go to Activity Section on left side Pannel of the Screen

2. Click 'Create Meeting'

3. Select Subject 'Meeting' from dropdown option

4. Update Start & End Date

5. Select 'People' to add GT resources 

6. Click 'Save' to send meeting invite to Client Contact


Steps to Capture MOM:

1. Click on Button 'Updated MOM'

2. Select the Meeting to update the MOM

3. Update the Meeting Takeaways in Description

4. Click 'Save'

Add Client Contact Role by completing the following tasks:

1. Go to 'Related' Tab (click 'Show All')

2. Select 'Client Contact Roles'

3. Click 'Add Client Contact Roles' button

a. Select the Client Contact details as displayed in the list Or can search the Client Contact by providing the inputs in Search Client Contact

b. check the Client Contacts available in pre-populated list and click 'Next' 

c. In case, any Contact added from search option, Post selection of User, Click 'Next'

d. Provide 'Role' at each Client Contact

e. Click 'Save'


Add & Update 'Problem and Impact Quip Template' by following steps:

1. Select 'Document' Tab

2. Click 'Open Template Library'

3. Select 'Problem and Impact Quip Template'

4. Update the Document

Add Finding Partners by completing the following tasks:

1. Go to 'Related' Tab (click 'Show All')

2. Select 'Enquiry Team'

3. Click 'Enquiry Team Members' button

a. Select 'Team Role' from the available dropdown option and add 'User'

b. Click 'Save'

For Sector Business Partner & New Client Owner:

1.Check assigned tasks

2.Click 'Enrich data from External Database' button (If required, update manually)

3.For more clarity email prospect. If prospect not responding then notify Sector assignment team 

4.Assign New Client Owner


For New Client Owner:

1. Schedule meeting with Prospect and Capture MOM

2. Click 'Client Fitment & Evaluation' button & add details

3. Add Solution & Expertise

4. Click 'Submit for NSL approval' button for NSL approval & Schedule discussion


For Sector Leader:

1.Review New client record & Approve/Reject with recommendations

2.Create & Assign Tasks

For Sector Assignment Team & New Client Owner:

1. Enrich Prospect details (Email, Phone, address)

2. For more clarity email prospect

3. Add Sector of client

For New Client Owner:


Document your lost leads to increase future wins.

1. Identify and log lessons learned

2. Schedule follow-ups if needed

Add & Update 'Engagement Letter' by following steps:

1. Select 'Document' Tab

2. Click 'Open Template Library'

3. Select 'Engagement Letter'

4. Update the Document


Add & Update 'QRMG Checklist' by following steps:

1. Select 'Document' Tab

2. Click 'Open Template Library'

3. Select 'QRMG Checklist'

4. Update the Document

Send request for creation of PitchDeck from Integrated Enquiry:

1. Click on 'Integrated Enquiry'

2. Click 'PitchDeck/Proposal Creation' button

3. Select 'Request for customised client proposal'

4. Provide Inputs in form

5. Click 'Save'


Add Commercials by completing the following tasks:

1. Go to 'Related' Tab (click 'Show All')

2. Select 'Commercials'

3. Click 'New Commercial' button

4. Post updation of details of Commercial, Click 'Save'
